website_summaries.verdict: Successful protection against mosquitoes and ticks. Offers several hours of protection per application.
pros: Applying repellent with wipes is easier than sprays and lotions
Wipes are convenient to carry when traveling
Repels mosquitoes and a few other insects
cons: Wipes are small, meaning you may need more than one per application

customer_reviews.title: Effective, easy to apply, pocket-able, wipes
customer_reviews.text: They do the job of keeping the mosquitoes off. There's not much more you can ask than that. Add that to being easy to carry along, easy to apply and reasonably priced. Pro tip: According to what I've read from reputable sources, the % of DEET determines how LONG it will keep mosquitoes from biting, NOT how EFFECTIVE it is at keeping them from biting. If you expect only short exposure periods, you can by products containing less DEET and save a considerable amount of money over higher percentage products. Spending an hour in the back yard? Lower percentage DEET. Spending hours out camping? Higher percentage DEET.
customer_reviews.author: MexicanRadio

customer_reviews.title: Good for refreshing mosquito protection. Worked well. Good for sharing fresh wipes with others while on a trip too.
customer_reviews.text: We used these to refresh our mosquito protection while in Costa Rica, and they were handy to easily share with friends. We used Ben's 30% Deet 6oz Eco Spray bottle for our main application, then these Ben's 30% Deet wipes to refresh our protection. We didn't get bitten during our trip. Our friends who didn't use deet protection, got bitten a lot. So Ben's 30% deet worked well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ayumi I

customer_reviews.title: Works as repellent -- GREAT to have with me anywhere, any time
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty expensive when priced out individually... however the advantage of being able to put a wipe packet into my wallet and have it with me at any time makes it worth the extra cost. Several times this summer I've been at events outside that I had not planned ahead for mosquitoes and was getting eaten alive. I used the wipe I carried in my wallet to save the day.... and by the way, the wipe is moist and large enough to share with a couple others at the same time, making for some happy friends. Get this, keep it in wallet or purse. I am very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Soar

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my mom
customer_reviews.text: It helped my mom during her vietnam trip. She said all of her friends got biten by mosquitoes except her. She requested for more in case she needs it for hiking or attending outdoor activities. They only complaint I have is the product name and price. It said, "Ben's 30 Insect Repellent Wips", I got confused and I thought it came with 30 packets. However, it is only for 12. Kind of pricey for 12 only because you can get a while big bottle of repellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sol W Garcia

customer_reviews.title: A good thing for an African tour!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an African tour -- and was glad I did. They are a quick wipe for insect control, often needed at random times when flies and mosquitoes are thick. I advise also using one of the many insect-shield long-sleeve tees offered on Amazon, use with these wipes and you will be quite ready for the bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Anne B

customer_reviews.title: Bug Wipes - Handy Just About Anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Ben's bug wipes are a nice way to get bug repellent right where you need it - and not breathe in the aerosol overspray or expose your kids and pets to the insecticide. Plus, they are handy for trips, outings, and to share with others. Keep some in the car, your purse, and your suitcase when travelling. They are small and easy to pack - and really help cut down on pesky bug bites.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful for occasional Deet need
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use a Deet mosquito repellent, but we wanted something we could take on a Caribbean cruise. We only needed to use this one day, in the St. Lucia rain forest, so I'm glad I got these individually packaged wipes as we have plenty for later. The wipes are definitely Deet-y, so be careful not to use near sensitive places like eyes and mouth. I used my Purell hand cleanser after handling the wipe. And we're adults - I wouldn't want to use this much Deet for a child. But they did their job for us - no mosquito bites!
customer_reviews.author: Jane S

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but are small.
customer_reviews.text: On a recent trip to Costs Rica during the rainy season we went through a lot of these wipes. Rainy season means bug season and while we did get a few bites, we were a lot better off then most people in our party. My only negative is that the wipes are very small so you will need to use multiple wipes to cover your legs and arms. One wipe is enough to do about one arm, so buy more than you think you will need.
customer_reviews.author: KTO 2.0

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These are super handy & zero bug bites! Huge fan. 1 wipe goes a long way. Melts your nail polish off...so....there is that!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to carry and use, however leaves a greasy and shiny coating on skin. In addition, after 7 days of use, it the product began to burn my skin after application. While not specific to this product, the deet it contains melted the plastic on my watch, and camera bag. I would use it again, but probably not on a multi day trip.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bink

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Traveled around SE Asia for a few months and these were indispensable! I got tired of carrying around another bottle with liquid and these were great to keep in my purse without taking up a lot of room! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L. Tarasco

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease and coverage of these. My son and I took them to Thailand and were impressed with how one really did protect our whole body- fine scent
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Individual packs for purse, packs, car.
customer_reviews.text: Love the individual packs! Can keep in bags, car, and various spots. Easy to pack. Contains right amount of deet to protect from mosquitos and ticks. Put the towelette on cap if swarmed when trekking.
customer_reviews.author: travel99

customer_reviews.title: Best Deterent Ever: The Mosquito Mesmorizer!
customer_reviews.text: I apply Ben's 30% DEET product to my clothing, neck and ankles before I go outside to ward off these nasty buggers. My rate of actual bites is almost zero! Before, if I went outside unprotected and stayed for 10 minutes, I would be eaten to death. That is how it feels...! Thanks for this product! Bonnie
customer_reviews.author: Bitten Bonnie - Better Now!

customer_reviews.title: Jungle Approved
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used this on our Honeymoon on adventure tours in Belize rainforests. I didn't get any bites while using this. We sprayed our clothes down with permethrin before the trip, then used these wipes in the morning on exposed areas: hands, arms, neck and face. We only reapplied after swimming, otherwise one application lasted all day. To give you an idea how well it worked, the only place I saw a mosquito land on us was my husband's eye lid, the only place we didn't apply this or the pemethrin.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J. Bickner

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: My family have used this product over the past 3 years and find it handy when you are out among the bugs. The any packs are just what you need for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: ljb

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great option for traveling, especially when you step off a plane or a bus or some other climate controlled transportation and need to get some bug repellent on quickly, without digging arou d in a pack or luggage for a spray bottle. Just k ow that these are only 30% DEET, which is a good concentration for most purposes, but ypu may need higher concentrations for areas with more aggressive insects.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rainman

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to take wipes instead of a spray in my luggage. They were compact and I didn't have to worry about spillage from a bottle in case my bag took some abuse. They fit easily in my pocket and I seemed to work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described!
customer_reviews.text: These things are pretty awesome. Easier to bring than a can of deet. Highly recommend. I was walking near a swamp and you could hear and see mosquitoes all around you, but not 1 bite. Just bring something to wash your hands afterwords. You do not want to be eating food with this stuff on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: We found these very handy, and light weight, to carry in our back pack. My husband will be throwing a couple packs in his golf bag, JUST in case he needs to go off the path to find a ball!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Summer must have!
customer_reviews.text: Life savers. They are a bit greasy, but that’s what you should expect from deet products. I had no problems traveling with these, and even now keep a few in my purse for emergencies
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Convenience item
customer_reviews.text: Bad for the environment, but so is my death from malaria so I weighed the options.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: I used these traveling through a rainforest in Mexico and they worked great! Easy way to transport on planes and in bags without having to worry about liquid counts.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: These work!!
customer_reviews.text: These work great...was at an outdoor party in the woods, everyone was borrowing them. Everyone who used these had no bites the next day versus folks who used other products got bit. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We've bought this 3 times or so. The repellent works well but the reason to buy it is the convenience of the packaging. There's no chance of a spill in the suitcase from a bottle!
customer_reviews.author: AAL

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and effective
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic for my trip to Thailand and Myanmar (including Bagan which has malaria!). Didn't get a single bite, same with my boyfriend. Very portable. I like that they were single packs so I could put them anywhere. I would use this again if I needed mosquito protection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are Excellent for preventing bug (mosquito and spider) bites
customer_reviews.text: OMG! These wipes are Excellent for preventing bug (mosquito and spider) bites. The ingredients combine perfectly to provide a layer of protection from bites, whether in the backyard or at a picnic and/or other outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Retta

customer_reviews.title: worked well with the skeeters in Guatemala and I love how easy they travel and come in little packs
customer_reviews.text: worked well with the skeeters in Guatemala and I love how easy they travel and come in little packs. Need two to cover your body well.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended but irritating to the skin
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient to keep in your backpack and seemed to work great to keep mosquitoes off. U give it 4 instead of 5 because the DEET burned a little and turned my 1yr olds skin bright red. I normally wouldn't put this on a baby but it was that or risk crazy mosquito viruses in the Costa Rican rainforest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took on five day horse ride w/ Mozambique Horse Safari--worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Took on five day horseback riding safari in Mozambique. Did a GREAT job keep mosquitos away. Would use wipe then set on the ground under the table at dinner; worked like a charm. Check out the Mozambique Horse Safari for a lovely equestrian vacation (find on Facebook to see some stunning photos). We were there in Oct 2013 (spring) and there was a steady breeze that also helped keep bugs away--no heavy scent. Would use again.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Has deet not for water use or protected water sites
customer_reviews.text: Great unless your going to a protected water supply like I did in Mexico at the cenote water holes, no deet allowed it kills the coral and marine life
customer_reviews.author: Maun Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Plane, Great on the ground
customer_reviews.text: With Premetherin treated clothes, I only came away with two stings in the Amazon. Yes, this was sort of like a chemical peel feeling but I would rather that than the barrage of mosquitos. It is slightly sticky but it dries to nothing. And you do not get that liquid issue with TSA. All of my fellow travelers used these making them a big favorite. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gurney

customer_reviews.title: The only problem with a wipe like these, as compared to a spray or a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have found these to be very effective. The only problem with a wipe like these, as compared to a spray or a stick, is that the stuff is all over your hands when you are done. Thus I use them only when I have a place to wash my hands after using them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Vomund

customer_reviews.title: very convienient.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to just be able to pull from a package and rub on. We used on a recent trip to brazil and these worked great.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Portability and Effectiveness: What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.text: Loved the portability because it fits in the smallest of purses. It’s a highly effective way to reduce mosquito bites, especially when they are the harshest toward the end of summer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works well for me at home and traveling. Easy to use and enough for two people
customer_reviews.author: REPP

customer_reviews.title: Not for African mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my trip to Africa. I like the fact that I could stick them in my purse but the mosquitoes were not phased by this repellent. They may work better for ticks or mosquitoes in the states.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Adjei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling, They are small individual packs that don't take any space. Went on vacation to mexico and i had them in my purse the entire time. One wipe was enough for my arms and legs must work since i did not get bit. Re-applied after a few hours but mostly for precaution.
customer_reviews.author: Elias J Montilla

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy these again. I usually use another ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy these again. I usually use another brand but could not find them in time. The wipes are on the small side so you need more than one. Plus I got bit all over so they didn't help that either.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Works even in the tropics
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wipes anticipating a trip to the forests of the Philippines and I did use them there: not a single mosquito bite! One wipe was enough for both arms and legs below the knees and I didn't have to re-apply it since it is not alcohol based and it didn't evaporate. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good but I like BugX Better
customer_reviews.text: I am a mosquito magnet and I'm also allergic to them so I take my bug repellent seriously. I used the Bug X wipes all last year and I found them really convenient. These were cheaper so I decided to give them a shot. They are ok and they seem to keep the bugs away but the wipes don't seem as moist as Bug X and they don't feel like they go as far.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Work well and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Packaging the wipes individually is convenient and keeps the wipes moist. The product works to keep the mosquitoes at bay and I prefer not spraying myself with product so I don't have to breathe in the spray. While there is a pesticide scent, it isn't anywhere near as strong as Deep Woods Off. I like these a lot and will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia R.

customer_reviews.title: 30% DEETWipes - WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! 30% DEET, which is what my U.W. Health Travel Clinic recommends. In these packages, can carry it on airplane, at least in luggage and maybe on carry on. MOST GRATEFUL for it!
customer_reviews.author: mary b. lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: Kept the insects off but this was too greasy for me. Had to rub it in after applying and then wash my hands
customer_reviews.author: jinjin

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best travel solution for preventing bug bites!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best solution for preventing bug bites when travelling! Enjoyed a great trip to Costa Rica without a single bug bite.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Individually wrapped fit the bill
customer_reviews.text: Needed individually wrapped wipes, and that's what these are. A little disappointed that the box clearly reads "repels mosquitos", but the individual wrappers does not say that. Have not used them, they are going in packets for travelers. Shipping was fast. Good experience.
customer_reviews.author: TravelGal

customer_reviews.title: Prefer spray
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Africa. I actually wished I would have had the spray. The first area you wipe down gets too much product and then you are left with not much to use over rest of your areas. Never sure if you were adequately covered. Jealous of my friend's spray DEET. These are better if you cannot pack a spray bottle I guess. And maybe to keep in your car or handbag.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bomar

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love these, keep mosquitoes away and you can carry them in your day pack.
customer_reviews.author: Matt's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pack
customer_reviews.text: When I travel to El Salvador with Habitat I only pack a carry on bag. These towelettes are great because they don't have to go into the tiny ziplock bag for toiletries. Ben's is very effective. Applied it once in the morning and worked Construction all day without having to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Handy little individual packets. No messy leaking bottles. Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really good to keep in the car or purse
customer_reviews.text: These are really good to keep in the car or purse. They work well. Yes, they smell of DEET, but they keep the bugs away. I use a different bug repellant lotion from a bottle, but when I forget to bring that bottle, these wipes are handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: D Harding

customer_reviews.title: These worked for us in Peru
customer_reviews.text: We used these in Peru and they worked well. Many of the other people we met on Machu Picchu had insect bites all over their arms and legs, and we had only one or two on our hands (probably because we didn't reapply after washing).
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Good price too
customer_reviews.text: When I apply this product, I receives O bites! Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Strother

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Repellent for Mexico Trip
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the convenience of using an effective wipe which really kept the mosquitos away. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really well keeps the mosquito away better than deep wood off for me.
customer_reviews.author: Momto2

customer_reviews.title: Small and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hiking and wildlife or macro photography. Wipes fit into your pocket or camera case. PhotosByMeta
customer_reviews.author: PhotosByMeta

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to keep most of the mosquitoes away (but not all). Need to use several wipes to get covered.
customer_reviews.author: S. DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Not too much odor. Worked on jungle mosquitos. Easy to carry and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Schlachter

customer_reviews.title: Went to Venezuela on to zika time and there were ...
customer_reviews.text: Went to Venezuela on to zika time and there were hundreds of mosquitoes around us every day. I used these and they dis stay away. They stink as strong repellent .... thus they work.....
customer_reviews.author: Gallego

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy transaction & arrived in timely manner
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy transaction & arrived in timely manner. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: susanl4199

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but you need to wash your hands.
customer_reviews.text: Works well on the mosquitos by the lake and easy to apply. Nice that I don't have to breathe a spray. But - it is not as "clean" as I had hoped since you need to wash your hands after using the wipes or else you will get repellent everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and they work welll too
customer_reviews.text: I keep a few of these in the pocket of my lifevest for when I am kayaking, I keep some in my backpack for when I am hiking. I usually bring a bottle of lotion with deet but if I forget I can usually find some of these in a pocket somewhere. The packets are waterproof and that is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our daughters trip to Belize they had no effect on biting bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to use and to pack- no liquids to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Renee and Rick.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: While visiting Nigeria last month I found this product most useful. No insect bites, it is worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Practical and effective
customer_reviews.text: These are great and work well for kids to apply easily and safely. Last long and also good to keep on hand in purse, bags and backpacks over the summer to use when bugs unexpectedly come out.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: I keep some of these packets in my workshop and ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep some of these packets in my workshop and my golf bag so they are there when I need them. They work very well.
customer_reviews.author: D Kennemur

customer_reviews.title: great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I carried a few of these in my purse on vacation. It was nice to have in case you need them. Did have to use them one night at a beachfront restaurant because the sand fleas were biting me. I will always keep a stash of these with my travel stuff.
customer_reviews.author: lost child

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used them in the past. It is much easier for trips, to keep in car or travel then a bottle of spray. We will bring to our cruise in Oct. In the past we have used it in the Caribbean and worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: James. Backus

customer_reviews.title: Easily solution for traveling tourists
customer_reviews.text: Very effective against mosquitoes and easy to travel with as airport security limits the amount of fluid ounces one can take in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Arjun

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in my trunk for those unexpected times you're outside and the bugs come out! (Drive in theatre, bonfire at a friends house, fishing, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Cancun trip! I didn't get eaten by the bugs :)
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used these in the jungle in Cambodia and all over Vietnam. They were recommended by a travel doctor, along with Permethrin spray on our clothes. The wipes were not greasy and did not have a very strong smell. They worked great for our group, including two "mosquito magnets." No bites!
customer_reviews.author: ABNY

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These wipes were convenient for travel in Tanzania. No liquid to worry about, lightweight and easy to pack. And, yes, it did keep those pesky mosquitos away!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was nice to have an item that was portable and worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: happy ears

customer_reviews.title: Great for carry on travel
customer_reviews.text: We only travel carry on and when you need a bug wipe this fits the bill. Took these to Africa and didn't have any problems. The wipes covered a huge part of my body.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Amaral

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: We were in Europe and this did not keep mosquitos away or from biting us. I wish I could return now, but they say it has been too long from when I purchased this to return. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Greg Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Great when you need a repellent. After using it, I hang it near by for on a strap of my bag or handle for extra protection
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McCahill

customer_reviews.title: This is a great option for traveling so you can save liquid space ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for traveling so you can save liquid space in carry-on. We have brought these with us to several countries and have found them helpful
customer_reviews.author: A. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: They take up a lot less space then a bottle and they did fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a trip I took to Africa. They take up a lot less space then a bottle and they did fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go on safari in Tanzania. These things are the way to go. Easy to use, ready to use, and no bites so guess they worked well. Don't keep off tse tse flies, but I guess nothing does.
customer_reviews.author: Danatravels

product_meta.title: Ben's 30% DEET Mosquito, Tick and Insect Repellent Wipes, 12 Count, One Color
product_meta.description: Ben's 30%-DEET mosquito, tick and insect repellent offers protection from insects that may carry West Nile Virus, Eastern Equine Encephalitis, Lyme Disease, Dengue Fever, and other infectious diseases. Providing up to 8 hours of effective protection, Ben's 30%-DEET unique formula is made to evaporate slowly - so repellent stays on longer with little absorption into the skin. Individually wrapped wipes let you control the amount and location of repellent to apply.
feature_bullets: Ben's 30%-DEET mosquito, tick and insect repellent offers the minimum DEET concentration recommended by the CDC for protection against mosquitos, ticks and biting insects.
Offers 8+ hours of protection against insect-transmitted diseases including West Nile Virus, Eastern Equine Encephalitis, Lyme Disease, and Dengue Fever and other infectious diseases.
Our unique formula is made to evaporate slowly - so repellent stays on longer with little absorption into the skin.
Easy to apply, unwrap a single wipe and control the application, ensuring the repellent reaches hard-to-spray areas. Fragrance free so you'll smell the great outdoors, not your repellent.
The individually-wrapped and easy-to-apply wipes offer portable protection perfect for packs, pockets, or purses.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
